About

I'm a tech enthusiast specializing in artificial intelligence, low-level programming, and hardware engineering. My work spans from building efficient neural network architectures to optimizing systems at the hardware level.

With a background in computer science and electrical engineering, I bring a holistic approach to problem-solving, understanding systems from the transistor up to the algorithm.

Currently focused on AI acceleration techniques, optimizing compilers, and exploring the boundaries between traditional computing and quantum systems.
